intro: Dichasianthus runcinatus, commonly known as the slender dichasianthus, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and have a smooth or slightly toothed margin. Dichasianthus runcinatus thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in shaded or semi-shaded environments.
